1.title: Crash and Burn
1.plot: Xephos and Honeydew, along with Old Peculier and Skylord Lysander, crash into their old home, only to find it has been completely obliterated.

2.title: The Road to Mistral
2.plot: Simon and Lewis set off down the road leading to a mysterious city, whilst mourning the loss of the Yogcave.

3.title: I DEMAND YOUR FINEST BACON!
3.plot: After arriving in Mistral City, the heroes are given a tour by Lysander, and meet a variety of interesting new characters.

4.title: Proper Quest
4.plot: The boys finally have some direction, and must seek out a secretive wizard to enlist his aid in curing the sickness that is paralysing Old Peculier.

5.title: Breakfast Distraction
5.plot: Simon distracts Lysander while Lewis attempts to complete Fumblemore's quest.

6.title: Mission Impossible
6.plot: Whilst in pursuit of the items to complete Fumblemore's quest, the heroes discover that one particular item will be more difficult to procure than expected.

7.title: Reburglarize
7.plot: The boys make headway in their quest, albeit after taking some losses.

8.title: Diggy Diggy Hole
8.plot: Old Peculier is back on his feet and the heroes are once again plunged into another adventure. This time, following in the footsteps of Peculier's father.

9.title: The Abandoned Mine
9.plot: Simon and Lewis investigate a long-abandoned mineshaft and discover a terrible secret.

10.title: Revelations
10.plot: After Peculier's ascension, the heroes head up and out of the mine to face the world with new information - only to discover that they are too late.

11.title: Crumbling Ruin
11.plot: After discovering learning of the great evil which has befallen Mistral City, the adventurers set off to try and save Granny Bacon.

12.title: Beyond Skull Pass
12.plot: The heroes return to their adventure as the go through skull pass and discover deep secrets about their fate.

13.title: World's Strongest Dwarf
13.plot: After having their fortunes read, Honeydew participates in a strongman contest with Strongman_Bruno.

14.title: The Tale of the Sands
14.plot: The heroes finally advance to Verigans hold and learn of the Tale of the Sands.

15.title: The Battle of the Breach
15.plot: Honeydew and Xephos rush to Knight_Peculier's aid and proceed to fight the battle of the breach, as Israphel and his forces try to make their way through to the other side.

16.title: A Beacon of Hope
16.plot: Israphel has breached the wall, and the heroes must scramble to defend it.

17.title: The Fragmented Map
17.plot: Having successfully rebuffed Israphel's attack on the wall, Xephos and Honeydew begin a search for answers.

18.title: Swampy Away!
18.plot: With a new quest - to find pieces of Karpath's legendary map - Honeydew and Xephos return to Minecraftia and resume their adventures.

19.title: The Pirates of BBQ Bay
19.plot: Arriving at a strange harbor town, the heroes must continue their quest for pieces of Karpath's legendary map.

20.title: The Dread Pirate Norris
20.plot: Xephos and Honeydew seek out the Dread Pirate Norris in hopes of finding Karpath's map.

21.title: Grimjaw's Trial
21.plot: Hunting pieces of a mythical map, said to hold the key to defeating an ancient evil beneath the sands beyond Verigan's Hold, our heroes find themselves in a strange treasure cave, miles deep from anywhere.

22.title: The Betrayer
22.plot: Xephos and Honeydew discover the identity of the betrayer, but are distracted by a dragon before they can deliver this news to the Pirates of BBQ Bay.

23.title: Evidence
23.plot: The heroes confront Jock about their discovery.

24.title: The Fiend
24.plot: The traitor is exposed, but he has one last move for the heroes to contend with.

25.title: Visions
25.plot: Far from home and without the guidance of their friends and allies, the dwarf and spaceman must struggle against evil and fight with their lives to recover an important map, which could hold the key to saving the world from a terrible evil.

26.title: The Mansion
26.plot: The heroes taker shelter in Skylord Jasper's Mansion - but their host may be hiding a dark secret.

27.title: To Skyhold!
27.plot: Searching for Jasper's planes aboard his aircraft carrier, the heroes must undertake a perilous journey to their next destination to continue their search for fragments of a mysterious map that is needed to save the world.

28.title: Fire and Ice
28.plot: Arriving via plane at a floating castle-thing, the boys must complete vague objectives from mysterious characters in order to find the remaining fragments of a map said to hold the key to saving the world.

29.title: The Cage
29.plot: After completing two of Skylord Baako's three objectives, our heroes must investigate some sinister events that have been occurring under cover of night.

30.title: Ghost in the Shell
30.plot: Our heroes must complete Skylord Baako's final challenge and discover the secret of Skyhold. The secret other than that guy who murdered everyone, we uncovered that last week.

31.title: Stoneholm
31.plot: In search for the final fragment of a mysterious map said to hold the power to save the world, our noble heroes arrive at Stoneholm - a strange dwarven fortress in the middle of nowhere.

32.title: Beer and Lava
32.plot: Upon rescuing their old friend from a terrible fate, our heroes must brave the ruins of Stoneholm to secure important supplies.

33.title: The Deepcore
33.plot: With Stoneholm secured, the heroes search for answers in the "Deepcore" - an abandoned dig site deep beneath the dwarven mountain.

34.title: The Spire
34.plot: After chasing the corrupt King Finbar through the forgotten dwarven mines of the Deepcore, our heroes must put an end to his evil plans at a mysterious building in the middle of nowhere.

36.title: The Last Letter
36.plot: A terrible discovery at Lastwatch Hold warns of a catastrophic failure of the wall. With time running out, our heroes must find their way back to Verigan's Hold, and seek Adaephon's help in deciphering the mysterious map.

37.title: Ballooning
37.plot: After healing Adaephon, the heroes set out in search of a tree, a tomb, and a secret - but following the steps of the map is treacherous at best.

38.title: The Hand
38.plot: With the wall shattered and the bastions of Verigan's Hold and Lastwatch buried in sand, time is running out. The heroes enter the desert to seek out the secrets hidden in the Templar's map.

39.title: Doppelgängers
39.plot: Still reeling from Knight Peculier's sudden demise, the heroes push onward with little or no direction.

40.title: Facility 4
40.plot: Chasing an evil clone of Honeydew through the bowels of an ancient robot buried beneath the sands, the heroes find an unexpected surprise awaiting them and must fight to find their way out.

41.title: Far from Home
41.plot: After escaping from the buried remains of a giant robots buried underneath the sand, the heroes must press on to find aid for the injured Professor Webley.

42.title: The Oasis
42.plot: Our heroes are searching for a healer in the desert to help their new friend Professor Webley, and they come across a familiar face who needs help at an oasis in the desert.

1.title: How to Survive the First Night
1.plot: Plunged into a mysterious land, our heroes must find or build shelter to survive the first night in a strange wilderness.

2.title: Spending the Night in Simon's Shack
2.plot: Honeydew and Xephos spend the night in the hastily-built shack and take an ill-advised foray out into the darkness to defend their land.

3.title: Moving Into the Yogcave
3.plot: Honeydew and Xephos establish a permanent "base of operations" from which to explore the new world around them.

4.title: The First Quest! Pork and Glass
4.plot: After settling into their new digs, Honeydew and Xephos need to recover their strength and spruce the place up a bit, so they endeavor to do so by searching for pigs and sand.

5.title: The Legend of Pig Island
5.plot: Honeydew and Xephos discover a floating island full of pigs.

6.title: The Mysterious Tree
6.plot: Honeydew and Xephos discover strange buildings of unknown origin in their world.

7.title: The Trial of the Pyramid
7.plot: Honeydew and Xephos attempt to solve Indiana Jones style puzzles to attain glorious treasure.

8.title: The Quest for the Bucket
8.plot: Having temporarily suspended their efforts to crack open the Pyramid of Trials, Honeydew and Xephos go spelunking for some materials.

9.title: Epic Dungeon Loot
9.plot: Honeydew and Xephos collect the epic loot they earned.

10.title: the Yogcave
10.plot: Honeydew and Xephos carry their spoils home on a freezing cold evening and begin work on improving their home.

11.title: Going Underground
11.plot: Honeydew and Xephos spruce up their home and begin preparations for the "big dig".

12.title: Hitting Bedrock
12.plot: Xephos and Honeydew discover iron, gold, redstone and zombies.

13.title: Setting Up the Obsidian Outpost
13.plot: Xephos and Honeydew strike black gold and begin operations to extract it.

14.title: In Search of Diamond
14.plot: The black gold won't mine itself, so the boys must hunt for diamond.

15.title: Hoarding Obsidian
15.plot: Honeydew works hard to mine obsidian, while Xephos explores deep underground caverns in fear for his life and sanity.

16.title: Dark Constructions
16.plot: With their obsidian in hand, Xephos and Honeydew dabble in the occult.

17.title: Yogcastle Construction Interrupted
17.plot: With construction of the Yogcastle in half-swing, the boys get interrupted in their building efforts.

18.title: Chasing Israphel
18.plot: Honeydew and Xephos chase their mysterious assailant.

19.title: Tunnelling in the Dark
19.plot: The boys take shelter from Israphel under the shadow of their Hellgate, and hatch a plan to return to the safety of the Yogcastle.

20.title: Terrible Switchback Stairs
20.plot: In an ill-conceived idea, Xephos makes some embarrassingly bad stairs up the side of the Yogcastle.

21.title: Ceiling Construction Interrupted
21.plot: Honeydew and Xephos get to work decorating the Yogcastle, but are again distracted by rude interruptions to their construction efforts.

22.title: Old Peculier
22.plot: Xephos and Honeydew follow a strange path.

23.title: The House on the Hill
23.plot: The boys provide assistance to some people on their server.

24.title: Troubling Events in Terrorvale
24.plot: Xephos and Honeydew continue to assist some strange people that have made their home on the server.

25.title: A Sinister Discovery
25.plot: Honeydew and Xephos continue to investigate the disturbing goings-on in Terrorvale.

26.title: The Tomb
26.plot: Honeydew and Xephos raid Israphel's Tomb in an attempt to rescue Daisy.

27.title: The Tunnel Run
27.plot: The grand finale - in which our heroes run through a tunnel.

1.title: Precious Dirt
1.plot: While waiting for Notch to fix Nether Portals in Survival Multiplayer, Honeydew and Xephos vow to continue bringing you Minecraft videos by trying out "custom maps".

2.title: I Have a Sense of Impending Doom
2.plot: While waiting for Notch to fix Nether Portals in Survival Multiplayer, Honeydew and Xephos vow to continue bringing you Minecraft videos by trying out "custom maps".

3.title: Mushroom on Toast
3.plot: While waiting for Notch to fix Nether Portals in Survival Multiplayer, Honeydew and Xephos vow to continue bringing you Minecraft videos by trying out "custom maps".

4.title: Other Breads Are Available
4.plot: While waiting for Notch to fix Nether Portals in Survival Multiplayer, Honeydew and Xephos vow to continue bringing you Minecraft videos by trying out "custom maps".

5.title: Food and Shelter (and Zombies)
5.plot: While waiting for Notch to fix Nether Portals in Survival Multiplayer, Honeydew and Xephos vow to continue bringing you Minecraft videos by trying out "custom maps".

6.title: Burn You Hellish Fiends! Burn!
6.plot: While waiting for Notch to fix Nether Portals in Survival Multiplayer, Honeydew and Xephos vow to continue bringing you Minecraft videos by trying out "custom maps".

7.title: You Don't Want to See Me Getting Wool from a Sheep!
7.plot: While waiting for Notch to fix Nether Portals in Survival Multiplayer, Honeydew and Xephos vow to continue bringing you Minecraft videos by trying out "custom maps".

8.title: Help!
8.plot: While waiting for Notch to fix Nether Portals in Survival Multiplayer, Honeydew and Xephos vow to continue bringing you Minecraft videos by trying out "custom maps".

9.title: Challenges Complete!
9.plot: While waiting for Notch to fix Nether Portals in Survival Multiplayer, Honeydew and Xephos vow to continue bringing you Minecraft videos by trying out "custom maps".

10.title: The Curator's Lost Treasure
10.plot: While waiting for Notch to fix Nether Portals in Survival Multiplayer, Honeydew and Xephos vow to continue bringing you Minecraft videos by trying out "custom maps".

11.title: Up and Away!
11.plot: While waiting for Notch to fix Nether Portals in Survival Multiplayer, Honeydew and Xephos vow to continue bringing you Minecraft videos by trying out "custom maps".

-1.title: Outtakes (Minecon Special)
-1.plot: The brand new Minecraft episode showing a variety of outtakes, as shown exclusively at Minecon 2011.

imdb.title: Shadow of Israphel
plot: Lewis Brindley and Simon Lane chase down the pale faced man 'Israphel', to rescue the blacksmith Daisy Juke, along the way they are joined by characters such as an undead dwarf, a fabulous blue-vested man and Fumblemore.::Weirdkitten
